::KitKat::

The venom was taking it's toll. It killed off each bio function one 
by one.  Her spark and lungs were just about all that was left.  She 
opened her eyes, but couldn't see.  She 
whispered,"Drill..bit...I..love...you..."

She gasped as the last of energy in her spark started to fade.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He saw her spark flucuate. He began performing several operations
> through the CR that should save her.
> 
> OOC: Since Yan told me that the Alliance base was on lock down and 
Hot
> Rod couldn't have gotten out, lets say that after slipping that 
letter
> under Feline's door, he went back to his room.
